messages.msgSnippet: ROFLOL, too funny!!!   we just heard on the 5pm weather that we ve had ... Pris, The *bug* in Llano says it got up to 112!    Felt more like C than
messages.messageBody:
ROFLOL, too funny!!! we just heard on the 5pm weather that we've had
>another all time high of 111* ... we're
>just breaking records right/left!!! sooooo, Llano and Dallas??? how high
>did ya'll get today???

Pris,

The *bug* in Llano says it got up to 112! Felt more like "C" than
Fahrenheit (sp?)!
Whew! Thank goodness for Iced Tea, Iced Water, & Nice Cool Lemonade!

Mel =) --(as she downs another glass of iced tea and anticipates pleasant
summers in the NW)
Ashling Ranch (ashling means dream in Gaelic--I'm dreamin' of cooler days)
